messages.title: Leading the fight against leaving the single market
messages.content: The election on 8th June is your chance to change the direction in which this country is heading. People in the Newark and Bingham area need to be protected by keeping Britain in the single market. We are the real alternative to the Conservatives who are leading the UK in the wrong direction. Every extra Liberal Democrat vote can achieve real change for Britain.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Keep Britain in the single market
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are the only party that has been consistently and relentlessly opposed to the referendum that has set the UK on the path to leave the European Union. Ensure the UK and the people of Newark get a final Brexit deal.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: £6bn extra a year for the NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We know we need additional investment in the health services our friends and family depend on. The Liberal Democrats have identified the fully costed funds and that is exactly what this nation really needs.
Safeguarding school funding properly will include protecting the pupil premium funds. Update schools with the refurbishment they need.

issues.brexitEurope: Leading the fight against leaving the single market. Keep Britain in the single market. The Liberal Democrats are the only party that has been consistently and relentlessly opposed to the referendum that has set the UK on the path to leave the European Union.
issues.education: Safeguard school funding properly will include protecting the pupil premium funds. Update schools with the refurbishment they need.
issues.government: With Labour in meltdown more and more people are turning to the Liberal Democrats to support our NHS, schools, and jobs. The effective opposition to more government cuts.
issues.health: £6bn extra a year for the NHS. We know we need additional investment in the health services our friends and family depend on.

community.content: To support our NHS, schools, and jobs, back the Liberal Democrats on 8th June.

images.caption: David Watts fighting for Newark & Constituency.
